abstract: Fired from "Two and a Half Men,'' the actor will appear in 10 episodes of "Anger Management'' beginning next summer, with the possibility of another 90 episodes after that.
snippet: Fired from "Two and a Half Men,'' the actor will appear in 10 episodes of "Anger Management'' beginning next summer, with the possibility of another 90 episodes after that.
lead_paragraph: Charlie Sheen will return to television next summer in an adaptation of the 2003 movie "Anger Management," the FX cable channel announced Thursday.

headline.main: FX Picks Up New Charlie Sheen Show
